moves.1. e4: It is difficult to see why I win. More difficult is to see why I loose. sweet is to win . not to lose. es dificil saber por que motivo uno gana. más difícil es saber por que motivo uno pierde. la derrota nos abruma y nos quita objetividad , hay que tener la humildad de buscar los propios errores.
moves.1... Nc6 2. d4 e5 3. d5 Nce7 4. Nf3 Ng6: this bishop is very strong. this bishop will be the fundamental in the victory of the black pieces. My mistake was not doing anything about that bishop. I could have moved the knight to a4.  or my bishop to e3, and instead of thay I change my bishop with the knight.
moves.7. Bg5: that is the first mistake. the bishop of the black in the dark squares is very strong. the movement should be bishop e3.
moves.7... h6 8. Bxf6 Qxf6: I have a weak point in f4. instead of avoid the occupation with the knight. I am going to commite another mistake.
moves.9. Qe2: este es el error. en lugar de evitar que el caballo contrario ocupe la casilla f4 . pongo la dama en una posición que va a ser amenazada por el caballo.
moves.9... Nf4 10. Qf1 O-O 11. O-O-O a6 12. g3: another mistake . to avance that pawn to f4.
